Champs-Elysées (Paris, France)
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Mr. la Fayette fait désarmer aux Champs Elisées deux cent soldats
Mr. la Fayette has two hundred soldiers disarmed at the Champs-Elysées
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Small skirmish between troops on a flat plain with lots of other soldiers in line formation
